SqlStatement.Comment: This adds a new project data entry to our database
SqlStatement.Sql: insert into projdata (guid, projguid, DataName, Description, DataType, ConnectionString, DevTimeUser, DevTimePass) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

SqlStatement.Comment: This updates the settings for a given project data entry in the database
SqlStatement.Sql: update projdata set DataName = ?, Description = ?, DataType = ?, ConnectionString = ?, DevTimeUser = ?, DevTimePass = ? where guid = ?

SqlStatement.Comment: This removes a project data entry by guid
This selects all project data entries for a given project
SqlStatement.Sql: select guid, projguid, DataName, Description, DataType, ConnectionString, DevTimeUser, DevTimePass from projdata where projguid = ?

SqlStatement.Comment: This selects a single project data entry by id
SqlStatement.Sql: select guid, projguid, DataName, Description, DataType, ConnectionString, DevTimeUser, DevTimePass from projdata where guid = ?
